name: Gary Turner
text: A very beautiful area of town especially at sunset! Also if your into pokemon go there is a gym and 2 pokestops right there, also there is a lot of natural water spawns in this area.

name: Kate Mccurdy
text: Love them! Jennifer and Morri are extremely helpful and friendly!

name: Anita Gonzales
text:
(Translated by Google) Beautiful 💚. Very beautiful

(Original)
Hermoso 💚. Muy hermoso

name: Kim Lewis
text: Stopped for information on housing. Very helpful. What they couldn't answer they sent me to the proper place.

name: Ginsu Broch
text: Can't anybody do anything about loss of money in the laundromat here in Rainsville . No contact number when dryers don't work washers stops running. And not a soul in sight.

name: D Magen Mertz R
text: Awesome Town 👍 Love this place

name: Gary Grimes
text: A valuable resource

name: El Erby
text: Informative meeting

name: Carl Jernigan
text: Neat and clean!

name: David Seidel
text: This is an active and enjoyable chamber to belong to.  They sponser interesting events and are socially active

name: Johnnie Phillips
text: Couldn't ask for a warmer welcome group. Was truly spoil for coming in the door. There is a way to say Thank You. Hope it is received. It was a pleasure.

resp.text: Thank you so much for stopping by, Johnnie! We look forward to your next visit and hope you're having a wonderful Spring!

name: Zach Mills
text: Super friendly and knowledgeable about the town and surrounding area.  Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Zach! We're glad you could stop by!

name: Rickey Moore
text: I love the folks at the Chamber.  Always helpful and easy to work with.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Rickey. Thank you!

name: Larry Daugherty
text: Great way for NEW business to become involved in the community.

name: Kim Hollingsworth
text: We attended a Master Gardener class in the training center.  A nice classroom and we were socially distanced.  Great place!

name: Earthangel888
text: I've turned escape rooms into a personal hobby after my first experience in Texas a few years ago. Imagine my delight when I found one in the city of Auburn! The manager is very friendly,patient,and personable. Even though he temporarily lacks sufficient staff at the moment, he is still able to deliver a fun experience for everyone. He deserves a good staff !  Apply if you enjoy creating fun experiences for people! I plan on booking more rooms in the near future and bringing more people with me next time! My friend and I chose "Imprisoned" and I'm glad that he enjoyed his first escape room.

name: Deborah Williams
text: I had such a great time! It was a little hard but not too difficult and was super fun and satisfying, I got out with 1 minute! Our game master Dawson was great too! Coming back tomorrow!

name: DeMarcus Butler
text: Had a blast! Went with the wife and two teenager boys and took on the medium difficulty room. The puzzles required thought and a keen eye, and were extremely fun to solve. Will definitely be back to tackle one of the harder rooms. Oh yeah, we made it out in time.

name: Dimode Rhee
text:
Event started normally with the game master explaining rules, objectives, & information regarding opening locks. Throughout the game, I noticed we actually had to open the escape room door to ask if anyone was there to help us—we had multiple hints. Even received extra with beverage purchases... the hint providing service was slow. Secondly, before the game started we were informed that the room had a tough lock to open where every group struggled... understandable... we received the hint to open the tough lock but failed to open so we called for assistance. Hilariously enough, even the game master struggled to open the lock... this whole process of opening one, tough lock took approximately 15 minutes—1/4 of our game time. With the intention of completing destroying the lock and my foot on the wall, I had to pull that one lock off with all my force after the game master left. But the game master assured that the time would get frozen—cool.
Thirdly, when time was up... the game master does not hesitate to end the entire game by punching in the last code spoiling everything. There was not a single thought in the game master’s mind to ask us whether we desired just a bit more time to crack the room... Game master simply walked in, punched the code, and we all stood there awkwardly, confused, & disappointed.
We complained about the lock... their response was there was prior information given before the game—true. We recommended them to please replace it immediately
We asked if there was anything that could be done to remedy our dissatisfaction with the room and the fact we paid $200 for one hour to elapse so unfortunately. They informed us that it was up to the owner to perform refunds, but the manager informed us with a possible discount sent through our email. It’s been a week... nothing. Obviously, their customer service skills need to be reevaluated.
Was a real tragic end to a group’s Friday night honestly. We went in expecting to have fun whether we escaped or not... but we felt robbed. Hopefully future groups will not experience the extreme dissatisfaction like we did.
PSA: DON’T PICK THE VAULT ROOM.

name: amy dilmar
text: Thank you for a good time. Great customer service! Minor tweaks such as a few clues on laminated paper weren't erased from last group. Fun and enjoyable!

resp.text: Hmmm, we’ll do better!

name: jacob hootselle
text: Excellent! Very fun. Fast paced and interesting theme. We almost got through it but no cigar haha.

name: Trina Taylor
text: Auburn Escape Zone is AWESOME!!!! We traveled from Columbus, Ga to check them out. It was worth the drive. The staff is professional and respectful. I love how they engage with the customers to make sure their experience is a great one. We will definitely be going back soon.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Z!  I cherish your review and can’t wait to have you back. We need all the support we can get during this tough time, bring some friends and play again!

name: Deidra Allen
text: Was our first escape room and we had a blast today! Erin was great, will definitely be back!

name: Michelle Broome
text: We had A blast! We did The Vault with 6 of us and it was so fun!! Can’t wait to do it again!!!

name: Tanisha Scarlett Bellamy
text: Erin and Emma what a great duo. Great service, loads of fun. We will be back soon. Thank you for the great first experience!

resp.text: Wow!  We really appreciate that, Tanisha. We’d love to host you again soon. Tell a friend!

name: Drew Malinowski
text: Myself and my wife came here and we were a little anxious at first but we left having fun and ready to come back soon! This was a great COVID safe date night!

resp.text: A million thanks, Drew!  Tell everyone because we need’em right now.

name: Annie R
text: Great customer service, the room was fun, and the game master was really helpful!

name: Paul Howell
text: This was great fun. I took my 15, 13, and 11 year old kids to do the cabin. They worked together to figure out all of the clues for an entire hour and didn’t argue once, that alone was worth the price of admission. The puzzles were challenging but even the youngest was finding clues and solving the mystery. When we finished they wanted to do another room!  We didn’t that night but will definitely be back to try the next room.

resp.text: Paul, this is a great endorsement and exactly what we are looking for--disconnect from devices, connect with family/friends.  Can't wait to have y'all back for another adventure!

name: Joseph Davis
text: Very fun and challenging!! We went as a date and it was a great time!

resp.text: Many thanks Joseph. Hope you have many more dates and play all our rooms!

name: Brandon Jameson
text:
We love this place! They are doing what needs to be done re: COVID-19. The place is clean and open for business. What a great place to bring your family.
Erin is such a sweet young lady. So helpful with a great attitude.
Can’t wait to go try our luck again!
Brandon Jameson

resp.text: Many, many thanks Brandon!  We need all the help we can get spreading the word that we're open, safe and fun!

name: Blair Owens
text: Had a great time. Went in with 3 adults and a six year and 3 year old. We did the imprisoned room and found it somewhat challenging but the game master was great with the clues and tips. Would definitely do again!

resp.text: What a great group!  Be sure to try our other adventures soon. Thanks!

name: Kelsey Grant
text: This was our second time at Auburn Escape Zones. They have friendly staff and great rooms. Very clean facility and a fun way to get out while still being safe during covid-19. Will definitely be back soon!

resp.text: Can't wait to see you again soon.  Please help us spread the word, we need all the help we can get as we attempt to bounce back after the shutdown!

name: Carsten Grove
text: Difficult puzzles that were a lot of fun!

resp.text: We’ll take that. Thanks for your business. Give us a chance to earn that other star soon!

name: Kim
text: This experience was so fun! We did the prison room and it was amazing!!!! It's clean, it's suspenseful, and makes you think OUTSIDE of the box!!!! Can't wait to come back

resp.text: Great review, can't wait to see you again!

name: Deana Schrimsher
text: Both of our experiences have been amazing! Erin and Ashlyn, our game leaders were very helpful and made the experience great. Our family loves the challenge of solving the puzzles and we have made it out both times!

resp.text: Amazing!  Y'all are 2 for 2.  Hope you'll try them all!

name: Jay Hartin
text: I've done 16 escape room across 3 states, and I was pleased with my experience with Auburn Escape Zones. Online booking was a breeze and our on-site service went smoothly. We did The Vault. The room concept was original and the puzzles were fair and evenly split between the two sections. Our game master, Riley, was great. She was attentive and helpful. We look forward to coming back to try the Puzzler Room.

resp.text: Thanks, Jay.  The idea of a cooperative room is daunting to some, so glad you enjoyed it.  I appreciate hearing that our Team is performing well!

name: Nathaniel Lazard
text: I had a great experience here. I’ve gone here many times before and with this pandemic I’m really glad to know the team here is working diligently to provide safe and clean fun for everyone by increasing room sanitation and adhering by state regulation.

resp.text: Thank you Nathaniel! We work hard to make sure that all of our guests have a safe, fun experience and were so glad that you enjoyed yourself! We hope to see you back soon!

name: Sierra Jacobs
text: Their rooms are great. The people are great when I’m there, and they would get an otherwise perfect score, but everytime I call them no one ever answers the phone. There have been times where I’m literally in the middle of booking a room and at 1 min over the time I can’t book it. I tried calling to ask if it was still available, and no answers EVERY time. Even if I’m not asking about a room and just calling to ask questions, I haven’t gotten an answer. I shouldn’t have to drive there in person to talk to someone, or just book online to interact with you all.

resp.text: Hi Sierra,  as we are a 'reservations' venue we are usually not in the building when no rooms are booked.  The 1 min issue you mentioned is a feature where games are no longer bookable within 60 minutes of the start time--this protects us from someone booking the 4:00 room at 3:55 and we're not prepared--once that time has passed the room 'falls off' of the website.  As for you having trouble reaching someone we are rarely in the building during the week (unless a room is booked Wed or Thurs) and we're there answering calls during business hours Fri-Sun when it's busy.  Beyond that we check our voicemails X2 daily and respond to calls as quickly as possible.  We're so glad you enjoyed our rooms and would love to host you again, I recommend email or FB messenger if you don't reach anyone on the landline (if we're there we'll answer!).  Thanks for coming in!

name: Rachael White
text: Our staff of 17 went on day leadership retreat and Auburn Escape Zones did everything they could to make our experience awesome! We had a schedule change last min and they were able to graciously accommodate. We loved it and we all had so much fun!

resp.text: We are so glad y'all had a great time, can't wait to host you again soon!

name: MoNique Gaines-Harris
text:
If you are looking for a challenging fun-filled excursion, you will definitely find it here! We are becoming somewhat of escape room enthusiasts, and Auburn Escape Zones is currently our favorite. We are closer to Columbus, GA escape rooms, but they were booked, so we decided to take the short ride to Auburn, and it was worth it. The staff was professional and accomodating while adhering to public health guidelines pertaining to COVID-19.
We did the Cave room and will be returning to escape the Vault!

resp.text: So glad y'all made the drive MoNique!  Josh at Exodus has some great rooms as well but we'd love to have you back to try all of our challenges.  Hope you get hooked like we are!

name: Cyntell Crosby
text: really fun! staff is extremely nice! husband and i tried the cabin was hard but still fun!

resp.text: Cabin is tough with 2 players, we'd love to see you come back and bring a few more players.  The more the merrier (and better chance of escaping)!  Thanks Cyntell!

name: Teck Four
text: Erin was amazing!!! LOVE HER! 10/10 recommend

resp.text: Thanks so much, Teck.  She is pretty great.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Sarah Ingram
text: Still open now during the pandemic and keeping the place neat and clean and giving out masks to wear!! Much needed time to get out w friends to escape being stuck at home all day!

resp.text: Glad you were able to escape with us!

name: Mike Milford
text: Super fun! Had a great time with the fam. Clean and safe, which was nice.

resp.text: YEEESSSS!  Tell a friend please!

name: James Collins
text: This is the most exciting place I have ever been to it's better than six flags ! But you have to use your noggin in order to find out don't rush!

resp.text: Boooooommmm, take that Six Flags!  Haha--we're a roller coaster of emotions!

name: edneshea williams
text: Had an amazing time s/o to guss he did great!

resp.text: Thanks EW!

name: Tyrell Jones
text: I had a blast I highly recommend everyone come out with their families it was awesome

resp.text: We really appreciate the recommendation Tyrell!

name: Leslie F
text: Super fun team building! Everything thoroughly sanitized!

resp.text: A million thanks, Leslie!

name: Wifiproblems
text: Really fun!!! Jordan and gus did great

resp.text: Yes, they're amazing!!!

name: Riley Anna
text: Staff was super chill and the room was super fun!

resp.text: Thanks Riley!

name: Steven Dixon
text: I've been to Auburn Escape Zones twice with friend and we have absolutely loved it. If you're looking for a fun challenge, I would highly recommend checking this place out!

resp.text: Right on, Steven.  We appreciate it!

name: Stephanie Yuhas
text:
Came from NC with the family to visit my son who recently moved to Auburn area for college. We wanted a family activity we had never done before. We googled family things to do in area and Auburn Escape Rooms came up. We booked the cabin escape room for 6 of us. We ESCAPED with 7 seconds remaining! We absolutely loved it. We now are gonna make it a family thing for us to do each time we come to visit our son! Highly reccommended!!!! The staff was amazing and so friendly and it was set up i side the building so nice and clean!! Thanks so much!
THE MCKAY FAMILY

resp.text: Amazing!  Talk about edge-of-your-seat!  So glad y'all found us, we can't wait to see you again.

name: jason helms
text: Fun time set up well challenging clues we didn’t escape so we’ll definitely be back. Great activity.

resp.text: Thanks a million, Jason.

name: Kim Golden
text: So much fun! It was a great way to spend an hour. I did a room with my husband and we really enjoyed the challenge. The staff was super friendly, too. Great value for your time and money!

resp.text: Better late than never--thanks Kim!

name: Todd Scholl
text: Great time for my sales team from The Hotel at Auburn University!!!  We had several rooms and think it was so valuable want to return when they get their "racing rooms" ready so we can get competitive between departments.  Definitely need at least 3 people but 5 was a great number in our room.  We will be back and refer them for team building fun to our clients!

resp.text: Todd aka Tony, what a great group you brought.  It was so much fun having you guys escape with us.  Can't wait for you all to come back.  Thanks for passing our name along to people who stay at the hotel!  Make sure you tell them to tell us that Todd sent them!

name: Andrew Smith
text: Myself and members of our group loved Escape Zones! We met Dave, one of the owners, on the first night and had such a great time that we came back the next day. The puzzles were challenging but fun and the stories behind the rooms were great. We loved knowing that the owners came up with the ideas themselves and that it was not part of a franchise. I recommend visiting Escape Zones in Auburn!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. Your group was a lot of fun and we hope you guys slay Blackbeard!

name: Miles Parker
text: Staff was friendly and very punctual. We did the Imprisonment challenge, and it was a blast! Puzzles were challenging, but not impossible. Price is pretty good too. I'm excited to doing my next one, and I highly recommend Escape Zone to anyone looking for something fun to do.

resp.text: Miles, we enjoyed having you and Kittye out tonight!  Very impressed at how well you guys did.  Hope you bring your brother and friends with you next time!  Happy Valentines!

name: Abigail Starns
text: One of the better ones we've been too

resp.text: Love that endorsement, Abigail!  Hope we can have you back for our other adventures soon.

name: Lakisha Haynes
text: If you haven't been, go! We went with a group of people and it was both challenging and fun. We had an awesome time. All of the staff members were super nice and energetic/outstanding!

resp.text: Loved you guys coming out!  Such a fun group!

name: Laura Runion
text: Unfortunately I can't give this zero stars! I booked online and, we got there early. We were told there was another group in the room we had booked. We waited half an hour then were asked to follow a girl to the back where we were told they had "double booked" The room. They offered us  us another room, one not as difficult but didn't offer to comp it! We did ultimately take a refund but left really, really unhappy. We won't be back. There's another place in Moore's Mill!

resp.text: Laura, I'm so sorry for the experience you had at our business.  Having messaged with you personally I feel that we've resolved the issue as best as possible.  We are a family-owned small business that thrives on word-of-mouth advertising.  I don't want to make excuses as to why this scenario unfolded the way it did, only want to convey my sincerest apologies for the perfect storm of bad timing that your group walked in to (city sewer system was backing up into our bathroom, manager was out of the building dealing with that issue, newer employee didn't recognize that there were 2 groups booked for that time slot).  As a fellow SBO you know that there are occasionally times when all the holes in the cheese line up and things happen.  We do everything we can to mitigate these events but this time we failed you and feel terrible.  --Shawn

name: Holly Batal
text: Great way to spend an afternoon. Older kids loved it!

resp.text: Many thanks for the kind words, Holly.  We'd love to host you again soon!

name: Sean Cornelius
text: PHENOMENAL experience. They packaged AMAZING value while being super affordable. Some places charge as much as double. I'm not saying thoses places are not good....I'm saying we really enjoyed ourselves here. Meeting the owners and getting to know them and their story added to the value of the experience. I would recommend this place and we're for sure going back to beat the other rooms.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We really enjoyed having you guys here and can't wait for you to come back.

name: Brittany Israel
text: I wanted to experience something new with my family as a big birthday celebration. This was the perfect outting for us as we are very competitive and love to solve puzzles and riddles. We chose the Cabin as our escape room and had the best time. The puzzles are all intriguing and require a little bit of focus and memory, but with some teamwork and brainstorming we were able to make it out just in time. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms soon, I can't say enough about Auburn Escape Zones. Thank you for making my birthday a day to remember!

resp.text: We are so thankful you chose us to celebrate with.  Hopefully fun memories were made.  Come back soon!

name: Tracy Brunson
text: My family had the opportunity to make a memory that will last forever thanks to the kind people at Auburn Escape Zone. They graciously incorporated a surprise engagement proposal from our future son-in-law to our daughter. We did the  Black Beard's Brig which was exciting and very challenging. It required teamwork from the whole family. This was an awesome experience that everyone should try.

resp.text: Tracy we loved being a part of such a special evening.  It was humbling sharing this moment with you all. Blessings on you and your family.

name: David Moore
text: Had a great time with my wife and kids! Just needed 5 more minutes!!!

resp.text: So glad y’all came in to play. Escape Rooms are a learned skill, the more you play the better you’ll do. Hope to see you again!

name: Kaylee Wynn
text: This was my family's first experience with an escape room. We were trying to find something to do with my kid brother and we were not sure what we were expecting when we pulled up, but we ended up having a blast! The employees are very friendly and helped made the experience more enjoyable! I recommend it!

resp.text: Kaylee we enjoyed meeting you and your family.  We pray you have a wonderful Easter and come back to do all our rooms!

name: Leadership Lee County
text: We took a large group (34 people) to Auburn Escape Zones and they were very accommodating. It is the best place for a corporate team building experience! Just let them know what you need and they will go out of their way to accommodate! Thanks for letting Leadership Lee County "Escape Auburn"! We had a blast!

resp.text: We've just hosted you again almost 3 years later.  So thankful for our loyal customer base!

name: Crystal Green
text: Had a blast in the cabin room!  The staff was great and very accommodating for our group. Exciting challenge that definitely put our brains to work and proved to be a great team builder activity for us.  So glad we were able to experience this awesomeness!

resp.text: So glad we were able to provide a fun and challenging experience.  Dig deep and find that inner superhero and come back to do that room!

name: Melissa Rohling
text: We had a great team-building experience with out staff!  We had 2 groups break out of their rooms and then we had lunch brought in for our staff meeting.  Everyone had a great time and we all learned a little more about each other :)

resp.text: Can't wait for you guys to come back!

name: Grant Gravitt
text: The staff was friendly and the rooms were well-decorated and immersive. Our group of 4 very much enjoyed themselves and had lots of laughs trying to get through the puzzles. Will definitely visit again when I get the chance.

resp.text: Many thanks Grant!

name: Tara Harbison
text: We had a FANTASTIC time at Auburn Escape Zones!  Our sales team utilized AEZ as a fun team building activity and we more than happy with the outcome. We broke out into two different teams, and since we are competitive, it was definitely a race to see which team could "escape" first. I have personally recommended this place to several clients who are looking to entertain out of town guests with a fun outing.  Great addition to the Lee County Area!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words.  Come back soon.

name: venus9 Cotton
text: Good customer service

resp.text: Thank you! We pride ourselves on excellent customer service. Be sure to tell your friends about us, & we hope to see you soon!

name: Janet Merchant
text:
I went with my family and a friend for my nephew's birthday. We did "Imprisoned". I cannot give enough stars! The staff were so friendly, and it was a very fun atmosphere.
A great time was had by all!!  So glad we have this in Auburn!!

resp.text: We're thrilled to be serving the A/O area and are thankful for customers like you.  Please come again!

name: AHS DECA
text:
The AHS entrepreneurship class visited  Escape Zones , here is what a couple of  my  students said:

Escape zone offered us a way to connect as a team for our tiger cage. Solving problems under stress allowed us to gauge each other’s strengths and test our team compatibility. This experience was crucial for the future of our Entrepreneurship teams.

It was really fun, I'd go again!

I thought that Escape Zones was really fun. It was interesting to work together with people who thought differently from me to try and solve the room. It was an enjoyable experience.

Escape Zones is a pretty fun place to go if you were looking to work with people together as a team and it would have been more fun if we got out!!!!!!!!

I thought it was great. It was challenging in a good way!!!

This was a blast.  It was very good for me to build connections and work with a group. It taught me that depending on fellow group members isn't a bad thing and to completely succeed it requires trust and reliance on one another.

resp.text: We enjoyed having your group out!  What an impressive and well behaved group of young people.  We hope to have future classes come out.  Thank you for your kind remarks?

name: Brent Carpenter
text: What a great experience!  I had the day of the appointment wrong and showed up and no one was there so I called.  One of the owners met us there within 15 minutes.  My daughter, wife, and I had a great time and will do it again!

resp.text: Brent we appreciate your business.  Please come again soon and try out our new rooms!

name: Brittany Edwards
text: Did the cabin. Me and my partner have done a lot of rooms. We did not escape but we both agreed this room was amazing. I do not suggest this for groups smaller than four as it’s challenging and has a lot clues. However the room was amazing looking and the clues were clever and everything went with the story line. Only thing I would have done different is waited until I had a bigger group to do it. They are super friendly and it’s not like any other rooms I have ever seen

resp.text: We appreciate that feedback, Brittany.  So glad you found our room unique and challenging.

name: Will Daniel
text: Great time and great karaoke

resp.text: Thanks for the stars, Will, but this may not be the right place?  No karaoke here, yet...

name: Keandra Baker
text: We didn’t escape but it was so much fun!!!

resp.text: Thanks KB, glad you came in!

name: Ayanna Thomas
text: I went to Auburn Escape Zones for a work team building exercise! I enjoyed working together as a team to find and piece together clues to finish the assigned task. The staff was very professional and offered to be of any assistance before and during the game.

resp.text: We enjoyed your team coming!  What a great group.  Hope you come escape with us again!!

name: Marlena Gillis
text: Our team had the pleasure of going through a room recently. It was so much fun work together as a team and learning about each other's strengths. Staff was friendly and helpful! We are looking forward to going back and trying another room!

resp.text: Loved having your group.  Come back with your family or friends soon!

name: June Milford
text: super fun challenge

resp.text: So glad y'all came in--see you again soon we hope!

name: Taco Master1334
text: I've been meaning to leave a review for these guys for a couple of weeks now, sorry! But I wanted to say these guys were amazing! I used to them to propose to my now finacée and the workers were extremely helpful with everything! They helped me choose which room and where to do it at. They were extremely perfessional and didn't give anything away when it came for me to ask, so she was totally suprised. The room was challenging for her but also a lot of fun! I would highly recommend you use them!

resp.text: That's awesome!  We're so happy to have been a small part of your big day.

name: Mary Isbell
text: Great Experience! We escaped and had so much doing it! The staff is very friendly and made the experience unforgettable! We WILL be back to do the other rooms!

resp.text: Loved having you guys here. Can't wait for you to do the other rooms.

name: Hannah Wright
text: This is the coolest place.  So fun and challenging!  You will want to do all the rooms.

resp.text: Thanks a million, Hannah.  Your opinion means a lot to us.  Hope you'll find your way in to try The Vault.

name: Kirkland Floyd
text: Auburn Escape Zones is by far one of the best things to ever come to town. The experience was challenging, thrilling, and boggled my mind.

resp.text: Kirkland so glad you and tHE  gANG could cone.Hope you come back soon!

name: Heather Johnson
text: Great fun for the entire family! Would absolutely visit again!

resp.text: We hope you will, new rooms available now!

name: Joice Milare
text: We had a Team Building outing at Auburn Escape Zones and had the most fun time! Highly recommended!

resp.text: We enjoyed your team coming!  What a great group.  Hope you come escape with us again!!

name: Mark Summerford
text: I took our office staff to The Escape Zone as a "team-building/get out of the office for some fun" event, and it did not disappoint.  Everyone had a great time, and we all want to come back and try to escape again.

resp.text: Thanks Mark for the kind words!  Glad your group had a good time.  Can't wait for you to come escape with us again!

name: Fenton Hughes
text: Really fun group activity. We did three challenges in one weekend! Very kind staff.

resp.text: Fenton we enjoyed having you all to AUEZ!  Fun seeing you all get better and better with each room.  Have a safe trip back to Utah!  Come see us next time you are in town.

name: Jessica Hopper
text: Good clean fun. Staff if very friendly. Will be coming back and referring a friend.

resp.text: Many thanks, we'd love to host you again soon.

name: Elizabeth Lundey
text: Great experience for my high school juniors and seniors!

resp.text: Such a great group.  We enjoyed having the Ambassadors escape with us.  Come back soon.

name: Vicki Langham
text: Fried green tomatoes were amazing. Everything was great and staff was friendly.

name: Laura REALTOR Sellers
text: All the lovely people here have always been so incredibly nice, welcoming and helpful.  Highly reccomended to locals and visitors. I've never met or worked with a group of people as dedicated to their mission as the Auburn Chamber of Commerce. Big things are happening here. Thank you for all of your hard work.

name: megan britnell
text: excellent space!!

name: Michael Henderson
text: Excellent space, great people!

name: Jim Revels
text: Warm greeting and welcoming.  Excited that we showed intereat in joining.

name: Kristie Lovelace
text: The chamber is great! Everyone there genuinely cares for us, our businesses and our community. We are all so lucky to have a great bunch of people focused on making our local communities the best they can be and helping businesses to succeed and thrive. Membership is worth every penny and then some!

resp.text: Thank you! It's our absolute pleasure and we appreciate you!

name: Ashley Colon
text: I have been impressed with the marketing that Sarah has brought to the Chamber.  Not only has she increased the growth for the Chamber, but she is sharing her knowledge for local businesses.  Sarah isn't the only friendly face at the Chamber.  I absolutely love the special treatment I receive when I walk in the door.  Thankful doesn't even begin to describe how I am for the Chamber helping me to grow my business!

name: Sarah Stahl
text: An innovative Chamber who partners well with regional organizations to ensure progress & growth continue to move forward in Jackson Co. Alabama!

name: Elaine Slater
text: So many great things are happening at the Mountain Lakes Chamber of Commerce!  The staff is willing and able to help businesses and communities with their business needs.

name: Vanessa Landreth
text: The Mountain Lakes Chamber Of Commerce is the best!! Their all great and do so much for our community!!

resp.text: We truly 💙 love our community and want the best for each and every business throughout Jackson Co!

name: James Trott
text: Great

resp.text: Thanks for your support James, WE appreciate you!

name: AJ Buckner
text: Very friendly, informative, and helpful

name: Matthew
text:
The Mobile area Chamber of Commerce is the best Chamber of Commerce that I've ever been part of. They are massively involved in the business community, especially with regards to small business support and economic development. Mobile is a much better place because of their hard work and determination to impact this city.

I speak not only as a business professional in Mobile but also an a volunteer ambassador for the chamber.

name: Michelle Moore Anderson
text: Thrilled to working closely with the Mobile Area Chamber of Commerce! Michelle Dickerson - Family Services Counselor - Mobile Memorial Gardens Cemetery

name: Gwyn Dickinson
text: One of the MOST RACIST CITIES IN AMERICA.
